Package edu.ntu.bto.model

Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.bto.model.User
edu.ntu.bto.model.HDBManager
public class HDBManager extends User
Represents an HDB Manager user. An HDB Manager can manage BTO projects (create, edit, delete projects, and toggle their visibility), process applications and withdrawal requests, approve or reject officer registrations, reply to enquiries for their projects, and generate reports. This class extends User to include a manager name and implements the manager-specific menu operations.
Author:
SC2002 Assignment Group

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()

      Returns:
      The manager's name.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu(Scanner scanner, BTOManagementSystem system)
      Displays the menu for an HDB Manager and handles menu choices. The Manager menu provides options to view all projects or only those created by the manager, create/edit/delete projects, toggle project visibility, manage officer registrations (view and approve/reject), manage applicant applications and withdrawals, view all enquiries, reply to enquiries for the manager's projects, generate a report, and logout. This method uses the BTOManagementSystem controls to perform the selected operations.
      Specified by:
      displayMenu in class User
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner for reading user input.
      system - The BTOManagementSystem to interact with for performing manager operations.
